name: DOC ATI
description:
Defender of Children ... and the Innocent

DOC ATI is an arcade type game created as a reaction to disturbing trends in the gaming world involving childlike imagery in sexual situations.

Do you have a problem with the sexual content in games when the sex objects have child-like features? Sometimes the front page or other less explicit images will display more childlike faces or other features; then later images will show a more mature body or other features. Sneaky like the devil.

Are you sick and tired of just having to put up with it with no voice?

No more! Jump in your spaceship and let off a little steam and defend the innocent!

Resist!

Rage against the latrine!

Refuse to go silently into a future in which children are targeted. Take the attacks on yourself; you will be shielding kids from harm.

“I sought for a man among them who would build up the wall and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I would not destroy it; but I found no one."

- Creator of the universe
